Hello Today I'd like to suggest the ability to dim lights while in flight as while both in shadow and light the stock lights are to bright and the ability to brighten them or dim them would be perfect.

This basically works like thrust limiters

Less limit = More Thrust + More fuel usage

More limit = Less Thrust + Less fuel usage

And the limters of the light work like this

Dimmer = Less power requred

Brighter = More Power Required

And the limters of the light work like this

Dimmer = Less power requred

Brighter = More Power Required

This is a good idea!

Unfortunately, I can' take mods.
